Class CaptureServiceHandler

    • android.os.Handler
      • com.paydiant.android.ui.service.captureToken.CaptureServiceHandler

  • public final class CaptureServiceHandler
extends Handler
    The Class DecodeHandler. This class handles all the messaging which comprises the state machine for capture.
